Description: Pottery ostracon, with one line of incised inscription - Coptic, over earlier erased incised inscription, from the rim of a wide-mouthed vessel.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394062) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394062)
